onyomiExamples.meaning: character (of a person), personality, disposition, nature, characteristics, nature (of a thing, event, etc.)
resistance (e.g. to antibiotics), tolerance (e.g. drug tolerance)
nature (of a person or thing), that which does not change according to external influences
fastidiousness, enthusiasm for one thing, meticulousness, monomania, obsession, susceptibility for a stiffening of the shoulders

kunyomiExamples.meaning: one's nature, one's destiny, custom, tradition, habit, convention
